long_description: With expandable sizing that grows with her, the well-cushioned and comfortable Burton Grom snowboard boots are a great choice for young girls looking to progress their skills anywhere on the hill. Dual-zone, oversize rip-and-stick straps are easy for little paws to operate without Mom and Dad's help. Linerless design features Thinsulate(TM) polyester fiber insulation to keep those li'l piggies warm all day long in the snow. EVA Room-to-Grow footbeds allow you to simply remove a layer of the footbed as her feet grow. DynoLite outsoles are soft flexing for solid balance when riding and hiking; ice spikes take hold on ice and snow. Outsole sizing indicators let you see how much space is left before it's time to remove the footbeds.
